sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Congé administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d1cca99447245110a06c690cd36d43cc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>reprise contrl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading) {
      return;
   }
	
	var delay = new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_reprise')) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);
	
	var duree = parseFloat(g_form.getValue("duree")); 
	
	if(newValue == 1){
		duree = duree + 0.5;
		g_form.setValue("duree", duree + ' J');
	} else {
		
		if(g_form.getValue("debut") == 1)
			delay = delay - 0.5;
		
		g_form.setValue("duree", delay+ ' J');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-04 14:02:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c5182e2047601110a06c690cd36d4398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>reprise contrl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c5182e2047601110a06c690cd36d4398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:36:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_cca5dbdc47685110a06c690cd36d43ea
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Congé administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c26ca1d447245110a06c690cd36d437d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>date control</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (new Date(newValue) < new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'))) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage("Date de reprise doit etre supérieure à la date de début");
        g_form.setValue('date_de_reprise', '');
        g_form.setValue('duree', '');
    } else {
        var delay = new Date(newValue) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);

        if (g_form.getValue('debut') == 1) {
            delay = delay - 0.5;
        }

        if (g_form.getValue('reprise') == 1) {
            delay = delay + 0.5;
        }
        g_form.setValue('duree', delay + ' J');
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-03 22:44:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cca5dbdc47685110a06c690cd36d43ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>46</sys_mod_count><sys_name>date control</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cca5dbdc47685110a06c690cd36d43ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:34:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Congé administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:82ab659447245110a06c690cd36d43ba</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>debut contrl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading) {
      return;
   }

		var delay = new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_reprise')) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);
	
	var duree = parseFloat(g_form.getValue("duree")); 
	
	if(newValue == 1){
		duree = duree - 0.5;
		g_form.setValue("duree", duree + ' J');
	} else {
		if(g_form.getValue("reprise") == 1)
			delay = delay + 0.5;
		
		g_form.setValue("duree", delay+ ' J');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-04 14:12:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>797b622447601110a06c690cd36d43f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>debut contrl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_797b622447601110a06c690cd36d43f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:36:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
